name: lorban
cooked: There is a typo. There should be 1<k_1<\dots < k_t = N, where N is the number of shares in the PPLNS window such that the m-slice contains the shares s_{k_{m-1}+1}, \dots , s_{k_{m}}. Recall that, by Remark 5 in Section 3.2, if S is a slice, we have that [ \sum_{s \in S} score_f(s) =1.] Hence [ \sum_{j=1}^{k_1} score_f(s_j) + … + \sum_{j=k_{t-1}+1}^{k_t} score_f(s_j) = 1+\dots +1 +t ]
raw:
There is a typo. There should be $1<k_1<\dots < k_t = N$, where $N$ is the number of shares in the PPLNS window such that the $m$-slice contains the shares $s_{k_{m-1}+1}, \dots , s_{k_{m}}$. Recall that, by Remark 5 in Section 3.2, if $S$ is a slice,  we have that 
\[ \sum_{s \in S} score_f(s) =1.\]
Hence
\[
\sum_{j=1}^{k_1} score_f(s_j) + ... + \sum_{j=k_{t-1}+1}^{k_t} score_f(s_j) = 1+\dots +1 +t
\]
